mapper.select: SELECT cash_date FROM cash WHERE cash_no=#{cashNo};

SELECT IFNULL(IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_date = #{cashDate} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND member_id = #{memberId}), 0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_date = #{cashDate} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND member_id = #{memberId}), 0), 0) FROM dual

SELECT cash_no AS cashNo, cash_date AS cashDate, cash_kind AS cashKind, category_name AS categoryName, cash_price AS cashPrice, cash_place AS cashPlace, cash_memo AS cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
